long_description: Pop the cork on your favorite bottle and fill up the GSI Stemless wineglass on your next camping trip. Made of copolyester plastic, the glass is BPA free and dishwasher safe. Copolyester provides excellent impact resistance and is suitable for both warm and cold beverages. Stemless design creates a low center of gravity for great stability on most surfaces. Slight bulge towards the bottom of the glass gives you a secure grip and also helps prevent the glass from tipping over. Glass holds 10 fl. oz.
short_description: Pop the cork on your favorite bottle and fill up the GSI Stemless wineglass on your next camping trip.
